pages.text: To hold the $(6)Divinity Sigil$() is to transcend the fragile boundary of mortality. You are no longer a mere traveler; you are an $(n)eternal force$().
While this sigil is active, the cold touch of $(4)Death$() cannot reach you. Damage becomes a forgotten concept as your essence is locked in a state of $(6)absolute immortality$().
Bound by divine blood, you shall walk through fire, void, and blade $(n)unscathed$(). You have become the master of your own destiny.
